item.title: Samsung Reclaim is Green and Free
item.description:
Contrary to what some might believe, being environmentally conscious doesn’t have to break the bank. The Samsung Reclaim M560 for Sprint is a prime example of affordable, eco-friendly technology. This slider phone boasts a full QWERTY keyboard and a vibrant 2.6-inch color display with a resolution of 320 x 240 pixels, capable of displaying over 262,000 colors. Its 2.0-megapixel camera captures high-quality photos and videos suitable for sharing. The Reclaim offers swift 3G connectivity on Sprint’s network, enabling access to services like Sprint TV, Sprint Music Store, and Sprint Video...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/samsung-reclaim-is-green-and-free/
